column3: ACK 2f79e9d00206a5230377f49be7b2f6da70f80417 -- patch looks correct and CI is happy\n\nThanks a lot for removing legacy cruft! Future generations of Bitcoin Core developers will thank you! :)

Code review ACK 2f79e9d00206a5230377f49be7b2f6da70f80417\n\nI've looked into possible remaining usage of any types, structures, macros or functions defined in `arpa/inet.h` in changed file, and there aren't any [(man page)](https://man7.org/linux/man-pages/man0/arpa_inet.h.0p.html)
ACK 2f79e9d00206a5230377f49be7b2f6da70f80417\nalso verified that no `hton*` or `inet_` functions are used in protocol.cpp (nor `in_addr`)\n
